about.heroTitle: Expertise at the service of your transformation
about.heroSubtitle: Mana supports organizations in their strategic evolution through an innovative and personalized approach.
about.identityContent: The name 'Mana' comes from the Polynesian concept of spiritual force and creative power. It represents this transformative energy that we bring to each project, this ability to reveal the hidden potential of organizations and individuals.

hero.title: Catalyst for innovative strategies at the
hero.subtitle: Manadvise bridges academia and industry. At the crossroads of perspectives, we coordinate consulting and research projects (CIR certified) to address impact-driven innovation challenges.

approach.title: Our approach
approach.subtitle: Interventions rooted in research rigor and focused on concrete results.

items.title: Strategy & Innovation
items.description: Define clear growth directions and design new models, turning ideas into concrete solutions through design thinking and business cases.
skills: Enterprise experience (Danone, Chanel, Rexel, TotalEnergies, Sodiaal, BNP Paribas, Konica Minolta, …)

items.title: Transformation & Performance
items.description: Lead transformation programs and support change by unleashing team potential while integrating AI as an organizational and decision-making lever.
skills: Operational excellence, Lean Six Sigma Black Belt

items.title: Collective Intelligence & Open Innovation
items.description: Create hybrid ecosystems and run collaborative approaches where AI augments collective creativity and accelerates solution impact.
skills: Facilitation of cross-functional teams (researchers, students, managers)

items.title: CSR, Sustainability & Transition
items.description: Embed social and environmental responsibility into corporate strategy to build circular, resilient models aligned with lasting impact.

manadvise.advisorsSubtitle: A community of experts available on demand to strengthen your strategic projects.

cases.title: Low-carbon innovation roadmap
cases.result: −27% carbon footprint in 3 years on the pilot perimeter, 6 priority innovation projects financed.
cases.details: Co-design of a 2030 trajectory, arbitration criteria, impact measurement protocol, CIR setup.

cases.title: Ethical & compliance AI due diligence
cases.result: AI governance framework deployed, time-to-market reduced by 30% for priority use cases.
cases.details: Risk mapping, ethical guidelines, architecture patterns, MLOps industrialization toolkit.

cases.title: Enhanced omnichannel customer journey
cases.result: +12 NPS points in 6 months and +8% online conversion after multi-store experiments.
cases.details: Journey design, A/B test protocol, indicator scoping, product governance.

cases.title: Frugal innovation unit
cases.result: 15 low-tech/digital solutions deployed, average ROI < 9 months, cross-institution rollout.
cases.details: Bootcamps, methodology transfers, framework agreements, impact tracking system.

manadvise.testimonialsSubtitle: Feedback from executives and teams after projects.

testimonials.quote: They translated our strategic questions into measurable operational decisions, without losing research rigor.
A very hands-on approach: we delivered quickly, tested properly, and made decisions with clear criteria. No fluff.
The research-field cross-pollination changed the program's trajectory. We finally have a robust, actionable framework.

finalCta.title: Let's talk about your project
finalCta.subtitle: Let's turn your challenges into innovation opportunities. A first conversation to scope quickly and effectively.

hero.subtitle: A training organization recognized for the quality of its instructors, its formats, and forward-looking topics.

about.text: Manacademy is Mana’s training organization (No. 11922589292). It leverages the experience of its co-founders and a network of experts to ensure high-quality programs. We blend theory and practice to support all organizations through major transitions: innovation, strategy, CSR and sustainable development.

trainings.title: Our training programs
trainings.subtitle: Three strategic axes to support your transitions

formations.title: Innovate to adapt
formations.formats: Formats: seminar, workshop, hybrid program (on-site or remote)

modules.name: Agility & innovation in industrial contexts
modules.description: Understand and adopt agile methods (Scrum, Kanban, Design Sprint…) and their implications in technical, industrial or complex project environments.

modules.name: Innovation culture & strategy
modules.description: Decode types of innovation (product, service, usage, business model), adopt an intrapreneur mindset, and diffuse innovation across the company.

modules.name: Artificial intelligence & use cases
modules.description: AI awareness, hands-on with AI/LLM tools, ideation workshops on business use cases, awareness of AI’s environmental footprint.

modules.name: Mixed methods: qualitative & quantitative
modules.description: Intro to research approaches combining qualitative data (interviews, observations) and quantitative data (surveys, stats) within an innovation frame.

cases: Global energy leader – Agile seminar (80 ppl, ½ day)
French bank – Posture & innovation strategy training (15 ppl, 3×½ days)
University of Montpellier – Mixed methods (6 ppl, 3×½ days)

formations.title: Create value with CSR
formations.formats: Formats: seminar, hands-on cases, field support

modules.name: Sustainable transformation strategy & operational CSR
modules.description: Basics of CSR, sector impact reflection, definition of concrete action plans for operational teams.

modules.name: Eco-design, carbon footprint, CSRD
modules.description: Understand current frameworks, assess environmental impact of products, services and organizations. Intro to reporting obligations (CSRD).

modules.name: Circular economy & eco-innovation
modules.description: Explore sustainable business models, eco-design principles, and revisit your model within planetary boundaries.

modules.name: Responsible digital & IT impact
modules.description: Measure the environmental footprint of digital, and implement a sustainable digital strategy.

cases: Consulting firm – Carbon footprint, CSRD, circular economy (15 ppl, 4×½ days)
Large accounts – Multi-sector CSR trainings (pharma, luxury, etc.)

formations.title: Anticipate through strategy
formations.formats: Formats: workshop, flash training, full pathway

modules.name: Vision, mission, purpose & values
modules.description: Clarify your organization’s identity fundamentals to strengthen engagement and strategic coherence.

modules.name: Strategic diagnosis
modules.description: Master strategy tools: SWOT, PESTEL, Porter’s 5 Forces, BCG matrix… to guide decision-making.

modules.name: Growth strategies
modules.description: Explore growth paths (diversification, internationalization, external/internal growth, partnerships…).

modules.name: Strategic positioning & business model
modules.description: Work on value proposition, benchmarking, Blue Ocean strategies, and business model design tools (BMC, Value Proposition Design).

cases: Large groups – From purpose to operational strategy

finalCta.title: I want my tailor-made Mana
finalCta.subtitle: Let’s discuss your needs to co-build a learning program that will durably transform your teams.

form.messagePlaceholder: Tell us about your project, challenges and objectives…

hero.subtitle: An application to design, deliver and track tailored learning journeys focused on skills. Already used by leading schools, universities and training organizations.

pillars.title: Three pillars to transform learning
pillars.subtitle: A comprehensive approach addressing the needs of the entire education ecosystem

pillar1.title: Management for educators
pillar1.text: Real-time monitoring tools, advanced analytics and customized dashboards to effectively manage your programs.

pillar2.title: Experience for learners
pillar2.text: Engaging interface, personalized learning paths and gamification to maintain motivation and engagement throughout the process.

pillar3.title: Auditability for institutions
pillar3.text: Comprehensive reporting, certification of achievements and regulatory compliance to meet institutional requirements.

testimonials.content: The Manamind platform helped our team to coordinate and I was impressed with the ease of use and usefulness of Manamind. The platform allowed us to track our progress and see the deadlines quickly, which was valuable for the effective planning of our project
testimonials.author: Student MIB Dauphine - PSL Spring 2025

testimonials.content: While formulating our strategy, we utilized various charts, models, and methodologies, which aided in enhancing our project management, analytical, problem-solving, and creativity skills
testimonials.author: Student MIB Dauphine - PSL Spring 2025

testimonials.content: Manamind, through an intuitive and efficient interface, gave me clear visibility over project progress, thereby improving communication and collaboration between the team and the students. It is a valuable tool that has enhanced monitoring, proactivity, and information sharing. The platform’s ease of use and clarity are an additional asset that makes the experience more tangible as a client.
testimonials.author: Kevin A

testimonials.content: I like having a step-by-step path and being able to track my progress. Seeing what’s ahead in the coming weeks helps me prepare and get in the right mindset.
testimonials.author: Paul

testimonials.content: It’s already quite visual: when you log in, you can immediately see what you’ve done and what’s left to do. That’s what really matters.
testimonials.author: Nihel

testimonials.content: Seeing the deadlines makes it easier to stay organized and move forward step by step.
testimonials.author: Nihel

testimonials.content: Centralization of all deliverables: everything is uploaded on the platform, plus the evaluation module via the dashboard — very convenient. Before, it used to be individual emails, but now everything is centralized. It’s easy to update the content and the deadlines of deliverables. Manamind is very flexible, which is especially useful given the frequent adjustments throughout the year.
testimonials.author: Yves M

hero.badge: Join a team that truly innovates
hero.title: Do you have the Mana?
hero.subtitle: Join the Manateam now

why.title: Why join Mana?
why.subtitle: Energy, excellence, kindness — and projects that matter.

cards.title: The energy of the collective
cards.text: Here, intelligence is shared. Ideas flow, expertise meets, things move fast.

cards.title: Concrete projects
cards.text: We act, deliver and learn. No fluff — real challenges.

cards.title: Trust first
cards.text: Autonomy, honesty, rigor: everyone is responsible — no micromanagement.

cards.title: Desire to grow
cards.text: We test, iterate and level up — together.

form.title: Join us
form.lead2: If you think you have the Mana, there’s surely something meaningful to build together.
form.messagePlaceholder: Tell us about you, your motivations and what drives you...

toasts.missingCvDesc: The CV file is required to submit your application.
toasts.successDesc: Thanks — we’ll get back to you shortly.
toasts.errorDesc: Check your connection and try again.

items.name: Yanis Otmani Es Sakali
items.content: At Mana, trust is given from day one. Real autonomy to propose, explore and build. It’s structured and rigorous, yet always caring.

items.name: Salhia Darmon
items.content: At Mana, there’s room to be yourself, to think differently, to dare. The bar is high, and we share that standard.

items.name: Alexandre Richard
items.content: My time at Mana left a mark — humanly and intellectually. I keep a strong method… and great encounters.

finalHook.line1: Mana isn’t just a place to work.
finalHook.line2: It’s a way to be, to do, to think.
finalHook.line3: Want to talk with us? Start by writing.

features: A certified Training Organization, specialized in major transitions: innovation, strategy, and CSR.
Flexible formats: seminars, workshops, and hybrid programs tailored to your specific challenges.
A network of practitioner-experts combining academic rigor with hands-on operational insights.

identity.title: Our identity
identity.text: “Mana” means the energy that connects individuals and multiplies the potential of the collective. It’s our way of acting: combining scientific rigor, field strength and a demand for results.

items.title: Rigor & clarity
items.text: An explicit framework, traceable decisions, measurable impact.

items.title: Co-construction
items.text: Solutions built with your teams, not apart.

items.title: Responsibility
items.text: Social usefulness, sobriety and compliance at the core.

associates.title: Manassociés
associates.subtitle: Two complementary profiles, rooted in research and action.
associates.footer: A senior duo, strengthened by a network of experts and practitioners.

team.subtitle: A compact, multidisciplinary, demanding and caring team.
